metadata.title: USN-6153-1 -- Jupyter Core vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Jupyter Core executed untrusted files in the current working directory. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6153-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-jupyter-core-doc - 4.11.1-1ubuntu0.22.10.1 jupyter - 4.11.1-1ubuntu0.22.10.1 jupyter-core - 4.11.1-1ubuntu0.22.10.1 python3-jupyter-core - 4.11.1-1ubuntu0.22.10.1 No subscription required
